text:
Champions League
OL - Benfica: the reaction of Rudi Garcia
At the end of OL's win against Benfica during this fourth day of the Champions League, Rudi Garcia returned to the performance of his team
05 Nov 2019, 22:59 by Charlie Creteur



Olympique Lyonnais are second in Group G of the Champions League after their home win against Benfica (3-1). The players of Rudi Garcia opened the scoring in the 4th minute by Andersen before the goal of Depay (33rd, 2-0). Despite Seferovic's goal before the end of the match (76th, 2-1), Traor√© sealed the fate of the game (89th, 3-1). "The second period was sufficient for the result but insufficient in relation to the potential of the team," said the coach of the Rhone club after this meeting. "We score a goal on an action stopped in the first half [...] God knows that the set pieces are important especially in the Champions League.It is a real satisfaction.We have dismissed Benfica but it will now be necessary to make result in Russia ".







Rudi Garcia gives news of Depay!




Memphis Depay + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Before the start of the second period, the former coach of Olympique de Marseille returned to the injury exit of Memphis Depay, touched in the thigh. "Yes, it's the thigh, I did not want to take any chances, it was out of the question, and on his last acceleration in the first period, he felt something." What do you imagine forfeit the shock of the next day of Ligue 1 against OM? Case to follow ...
